name: Evotars Sentience
description:
Evotars Sentience is a pixel art game which is developed in 48 hours for FrostJam game jam event by Arda Algül, Burak Kayalak, Gökcan Kırca, Görkem Küpeli, Okan Bayrak and Safa Katırcıoğlu in 02/2022.

As the player, you are shadow of the system in the world. There are problems and programs are responsible to solve problems. They randomly move around the map to find a problem to solve. You are able to develop new programs. But there is a contradiction; program who ever solves a problem is becoming sentient. And when they see any other program, they share their knowledge. Your task is making the programs to solve the problems and preventing them to become sentient. By the way, have I ever mentioned that you have a time limit to complete a level?

-Controls

WASD or arrow keys for moving around and "Space" key for spawning walls to isolate a program or breaking the connection between two programs while they share their knowledge.
